title: Wanted to join any clubs ARAM / Normal /Ranked
body:
Hey, everyone
I wanted to join any clubs because I always played by my owns. Dont have many friends. I am Platinum 5 this season. Main ADC SUP or mid. Feel free to add me and invite me to your club. Also A big fan of ARAM.

ID is same as user name in here.
Cheers

replies.body: hit me up. are club has 44 members and we're always looking for more
